nodes.title: Model links
widgets_values:
You can't mix GGUF MultiTalk with non-GGUF main model, but you can mix different GGUF Qtypes with eachother.

GGUF:

[https://huggingface.co/city96/Wan2.1-I2V-14B-480P-gguf/tree/main](https://huggingface.co/city96/Wan2.1-I2V-14B-480P-gguf/tree/main)

[https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy_GGUF/tree/main/InfiniteTalk](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy_GGUF/tree/main/InfiniteTalk)

Fp8:

[https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy_fp8_scaled](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy_fp8_scaled/tree/main/InfiniteTalk)

fp16:

[https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/tree/main/InfiniteTalk](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/tree/main/InfiniteTalk)

increase audio_scale for stronger effect

audio_cfg is only used when sampler is using cfg as well

num_frames is the maximum frame count to generate, if the value is higher than your audio length would be, the audio length is used

Clip vision is not strictly necessary

Any I2V model should work, MAGREF can be interesting to play with as well.

bright tones, overexposed, static, blurred details, subtitles, style, works, paintings, images, static, overall gray, worst quality, low quality, JPEG compression residue, ugly, incomplete, extra fingers, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn faces, deformed, disfigured, misshapen limbs, fused fingers, still picture, messy background, three legs, many people in the background, walking backwards
